Private Attributes

  • PacketContainer ** m_requestPackets
    The array of the PacketContainers containing the request packets.
  • PacketContainer ** m_replyPackets
    The array of the PacketContainers containing the reply packets.
  • int m_nbrAllocPackets
    The number of request and reply packets (the size of the arrays).
  • int m_curAddRequestPacketPos
    The current position to add packets in the requestPackets array.
  • int m_curGetRequestPacketPos
    The current position to get packets in the requestPackets array.
  • int m_nbrProcessedPackets
    The number of packets in m_replyPackets.

Detailed Description

Class used to send several RequestPackets to one module.

int  nbrPackets
) 
 

Constructor for the request.

Parameters:
reqID A unique request ID.
nbrPackets The number of packets to allocate space for.

virtual MultiplePacketsRequest::~MultiplePacketsRequest (   )  [virtual]
 

Destructor that removes any contained packets not given away by getNextPacket or getAnswer(int).

Member Function Documentation

bool MultiplePacketsRequest::add (  PacketContainer *  container  ) 
 

Add a PacketContainer to the collection of containers in this request.

Parameters:
container The PacketContainer to add.
Returns:
True if container was added, false if index was out of array range.

PacketContainer* MultiplePacketsRequest::getAnswer (  int  i  ) 
 

Get the specified answer from the collection of packets.

NULL will be returned if index is out of range. The returned PacketContainer must be deleted elsewhere. This function can only be used once for each position, thereafter NULL will always be returned.

Parameters:
i The position of the wanted packet.
Returns:
The PacketContainer containing the packet at position i.

PacketContainer* MultiplePacketsRequest::getAnswer (   )  [virtual]
 

This function has an implementation only because it is defined as true virtual in the base class Request.

Returns:
A PacketContainer* that is always NULL.

Reimplemented from Request.

PacketContainer* MultiplePacketsRequest::getNextPacket (   )  [virtual]
 

Get the next packet from the collection of packets contained in this request.

This PacketContainer must be deleted elsewhere.

Returns:
A PacketContainer containing the next packet.

Reimplemented from Request.

void MultiplePacketsRequest::processPacket (  PacketContainer *  container  )  [virtual]
 

Process the data returned by a module.

Parameters:
container A PacketContainer containing the data to process.

Implements Request.
